{{Description|The battle against the beast from another world was the intersection point for this world's fate.<br>Today, [[Fontaine]] treads a brighter path.<br>But the echoing whale-song of the giant will not fade utterly from your mind.<br>Relive your memories and once again partake in the battle. Maybe you'll learn something new.|Memories: The Titan Amidst the Stars}}
'''Shadow of Another World''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing {{Quest|Finale}}. Players can relive the battle against the [[All-Devouring Narwhal]] and receive bountiful rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|All-Devouring Narwhal|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
* Dealing DMG to the All-Devouring Narwhal and destroying the Eye of the Maelstrom it creates can draw its hostility. Once this builds to its limit, the creature will devour the character, causing them to enter the belly of the beast. Defeating the dark shadow within the belly will deal significant DMG to the Narwhal and cause it to fall into a weakened state. Pneuma or Ousia attacks can quickly destroy the whirlpool, and can also interrupt the shadow's attacks. When the health of the All-Devouring Narwhal is relatively low, it will no longer devour characters.
